title: Burnley v Chelsea: Premier League – live
summary: Top-flight English football is back as Enzo Maresca's team prepares to face their opponents at Turf Moor. Fans can expect a detailed, minute-by-minute report from Taha Hashim. The excitement builds as the new season kicks off.

title: Premier League top scorers 2025-26: who is leading race for golden boot?
summary: The English Premier League's top scorers are making headlines this season, showcasing their impressive goal-scoring abilities. Fans can follow the standout performances of these players as they compete for the prestigious Golden Boot. The competition remains fierce, with several hot shots vying for the top spot in the charts.

title: Travball 1-0 Bazball: Head’s big numbers add up to a damning zero for England | Geoff Lemon
summary: Australia made a strategic decision to replace Usman Khawaja with Travis Head as opener. Head responded with a remarkable 69-ball century, the second fastest in Ashes history. This performance played a key role in securing a victory in the Test match.

title: US officials expect to pressure Zelenskyy into signing Ukraine ‘peace deal’ – live
summary: The U.S. is optimistic that the prospect of a less favorable deal in the future will persuade Ukrainian President Zelenskyy to reach an agreement. Officials believe this strategy will drive negotiations forward. The concern is to secure effective support for Ukraine amid ongoing conflicts.

title: Cop30 live: ‘Clown show’ talks run into overtime with no clarity on climate deal
summary: Negotiations extended late into the night at the summit, leaving delegates uncertain about the final outcome. As they prepare to depart, the results of the discussions remain ambiguous. The lack of clarity suggests that key decisions are still pending.
